children.description: Given get endpoint of Pet API
Get end point url for pet request
When I add the pet to the store with details Sandra , sold and SandraCopy

Get param for pet request: Pet_Add_New

userStory.storyName: Pet API Create, Read , Update and Delete Operations
userStory.narrative:
In order to Add new Pet using POST request on the pet api
  In order to select the type of Pet I want to search using GET request
  In order to delete Pet using DELETE request on the pet api
  In order to update the Pet details using PUT request on the pet api

featureTag.name: Pet/Pet API Create, Read , Update and Delete Operations

title: A api POST call with Pet API with valid end point and correct body parameters to add new pet

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given get endpoint of Pet API
When I add the pet to the store with details <name> , <status> and <PhotoURL>
Then The Pet details should be present with <name> , <status>
